Text: O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Joe̩l o̩ma Pe̩tiue̩l de̩;
Me̩ gbʼe-i, ame̩ abogijo,
Me̩ mʼu du ka ñw amo̩ma-me̩,
E̩wñ kʼide̩ imiejo to̩no̩,
Mʼolu ji, ame̩ amañmo̩te̩, ku me̩ raku;
Todu abo uche̩ichiʼka lewa oj ane̩-mi me̩,
I mʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi du chihi rinyo̩,
Dinaku dabe̩ne̩ kʼigbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n
Ma mʼe̩wñ ele eduwa kpai omi eduwa ko̩da
Ane̩ uche̩ chile̩che̩ te̩,
Anyo̩ ki mu me̩, ame̩ amaluche̩,
Ikeli le̩ gbe̩,
Kʼe̩wñ lʼago-me̩, ku me̩ dinaku, ame̩, amatama,
Me̩ che kʼalu ejiʼka ki fo̩,
Atogwo ñw o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i!
Uje̩wñ muda eju-wa n?
Ugbe̩-wñ ku ma nʼebo ñw u ache̩ me̩,
Me̩ gbʼabu kʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ jʼafifi!
O Jihofa, uwe̩ naraku do̩.
Ochochi ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko du jʼache fafafa ñw e̩
